data.title: Time Warner Cable Now Known as Spectrum
data.meta_description: Starting Tuesday, your cable service has a new name. Time Warner Cable is now known as Spectrum.
data.text:
Starting Tuesday, your cable service has a new name.Ã‚ Time Warner Cable is now known as Spectrum.

Services available to cable customers include TV, internet and phone.

With the new name also comes nationally uniform pricing with no modem fees or data caps. The changes come following the merger of Charter Communications and Time Warner Cable earlier this year.

Spectrum is also investing in its network and plans to add 20,000 jobs to improve customer service. For those interested in learning more about Spectrum, go to www.spectrum.com or call 855-70-SPECTRUM.

Charter Communications is the parent company of Time Warner Cable News.
